response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (21 years)", "high", "Being young is associated with higher impulsivity and risk-taking behavior, increasing probability of recidivism."],
    ["Prior Arrests (9 arrests)", "high", "A high number of prior arrests and convictions strongly correlate with continued criminal behavior."],
    ["Substance Use (marijuana and cocaine use)", "high", "Recent drug use is linked to an increased likelihood of engaging in criminal activities and recidivism."],
    ["Education (GED, not in college)", "medium", "Limited educational attainment may contribute to fewer opportunities, but GED certification shows some level of achievement."],
    ["Employment (1 job held during the year)", "medium", "Low job stability is a risk factor, suggesting economic instability, yet employment presence provides some structure."],
    ["Marital Status (never married)", "medium", "Lack of marital support can contribute to instability, although this effect is moderate."],
    ["Living Situation (not living alone)", "low", "Not living alone may provide some informal social control, slightly mitigating risk."],
    ["Family Background (lived with biological father in a small urban household)", "medium", "Urban upbringing with a small household can indicate exposure to higher crime environments, though family presence may moderate risk."],
    ["Religious Belief (believes God influences his life)", "low", "Spiritual beliefs can offer personal resilience and guidance, which may reduce the likelihood of recidivism."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 80
}

risk_factors: Being young is associated with higher impulsivity and risk-taking behavior, increasing probability of recidivism.
A high number of prior arrests and convictions strongly correlate with continued criminal behavior.
Recent drug use is linked to an increased likelihood of engaging in criminal activities and recidivism.
Limited educational attainment may contribute to fewer opportunities, but GED certification shows some level of achievement.
Employment (1 job held during the year)
Low job stability is a risk factor, suggesting economic instability, yet employment presence provides some structure.
Lack of marital support can contribute to instability, although this effect is moderate.
Not living alone may provide some informal social control, slightly mitigating risk.
Family Background (lived with biological father in a small urban household)
Urban upbringing with a small household can indicate exposure to higher crime environments, though family presence may moderate risk.
Religious Belief (believes God influences his life)
Spiritual beliefs can offer personal resilience and guidance, which may reduce the likelihood of recidivism.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 9 times and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 6 inches and weighs 155 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological father in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
